QuestData.Title: Finding a Foothold
QuestData.Description: So, you are the one that has led my children home? I have been waiting for you.$b$bThe Iron Horde grows stronger every day.$b$bI have foreseen a great battle, but my visions are clouded. It's as if time is sitting on top of itself. $b$bOne thing is certain, your presence here is of great importance.

Objectives.Objective: Accompany Prophet Velen to Lunarfall Ruins
